title: (Mon Full Show) William Shatner Is On The Show Talking About His New Book And Going To Space + What Happened At Lunchbox's Acting Debut in Las Vegas That Made Bobby Mad + The Crazy Thing That Happened During Amy's Uber Ride
itunes:title: (Mon Full Show) William Shatner Is On The Show Talking About His New Book And Going To Space + What Happened At Lunchbox's Acting Debut in Las Vegas That Made Bobby Mad + The Crazy Thing That Happened During Amy's Uber Ride
description:
William Shatner joins us today! He talks about his new book "Boldly Go: Reflections on a Life of Awe and Wonder," meeting Elvis Presley, going to space in real life and more! Plus, Lunchbox had a big weekend in Las Vegas making his acting debut in "Bat Out Of Hell." Hear how the performance went and find out what happened to his lines that made Bobby mad. Then, Bobby and Amy went to a wedding this weekend and the craziest thing happened to Amry during her Uber ride home! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
